title: Mass Effect!
author: JGray
text:
I am currently playing around with the multiplayer demo for Mass Effect 3. I'm enjoying it a lot more than I thought I would. That is a pleasant surprise. Still, it is no substitute for the real thing and I'll be pleased as punch when the full game comes out on March 6th.

No deep thoughts today, folks. Enjoy the page. Next week, the story ends! This chapter, anyway.

replies.author: Felix Ple»ôoianu*Guest*
replies.text: Wow. I didn't realize until this page, but Theresa looks especially attractive with the new art.

replies.author: Uhl*Guest*
replies.text:
Wait, ME3 coming out Mar 6!?

(Squee's like a rabid fangirl.) SQUUUUUEEEEEE!!!!!!

replies.author: Gennifer*Guest*
replies.text: @Felix-  thank you.  I've been working at binging out the fact that Teresa is quite beautiful, and is really not aware of it at all.
